    ¬†This pTron Mini Bluetooth Speaker with mic is such a cute and fun speaker. The sound quality is good for a small room and is clear and punchy at 16w. The wireless mic connects easily to the speaker and you can have a small karaoke party. There are funny changing voices in the mic. Speaker is lightweight yet well built. Works for around 4-5 hours on BT Mode and RGB lights on. Overall value for money product.

I recently bought this small Bluetooth speaker with a microphone for my kids, and it's been a hit! The sound quality is excellent for its size, and the volume control is perfect for little ears. The built-in microphone is a game-changer, allowing my kids to sing along to their favorite songs and even practice speeches. It's lightweight and durable, ideal for playtime both indoors and outdoors. Pairing with devices is easy, and the bright, kid-friendly design makes it even more appealing. Highly recommend for any young music lover!

    ¬†Got this cute little baby delivered 10 days back. And all i can say is this is a party starter. The sound. The Lights. The Mic. Everything is just what you need to get a party started.The sound on this is very crisp and clear. You can also feel the bass.The RGB light is so cool to watch.It's Performance Justifies it's price.The battery takes and hour or so get charged and lasts around 5-6 hours with the RGB on.Also it's quite heavy and that thanks to the vegan leather strap. It's easy to carry everywhere and anywhere.And how can i even forget about the microphone. It's just hilarious. It's not a proper karaoke mic or something like that. It's just a fun mic.You're gonna love it.

reviewTitle: Fantastic Karaoke Speaker ‚Äì Great Sound and Fun for All!
reviewDescription: I recently purchased this karaoke speaker, and it has been a total game-changer for our family gatherings and parties! The sound quality is amazing, with clear highs and deep bass, making every song sound incredible. The built-in microphone is easy to use, and the speaker has plenty of volume to fill the room, whether you're indoors or outdoors.The Bluetooth connection works seamlessly, and we were able to stream music from our phones without any issues. The light effects add a fun, festive vibe to the experience, making it even more enjoyable. I also love the long battery life ‚Äì we‚Äôve had hours of singing without needing to recharge.Overall, this karaoke speaker is a must-have for anyone looking to liven up their parties. It's durable, portable, and provides fantastic sound quality. Highly recommend!
